title: Vintage Board Games
description: Classic board games from decades past

questions.question: In the original Monopoly game, what is the most expensive property on the board?

In the game of Life, what do players spin to move their car along the board?
Which classic game has players remove wooden blocks from a tower without toppling it?
What is the name of the detective players are trying to identify in Clue?
options: There is no detective â€” players find the murderer

questions.question: In Scrabble, how many points is the letter 'Z' worth?
Which Milton Bradley game featured a plastic hippopotamus that gobbled up marbles?
What classic strategy game involves capturing your opponent's pieces by jumping over them?
In Trivial Pursuit, what color wedge represents the Science & Nature category?
Which 1965 Milton Bradley game had players build an elaborate Rube Goldberg-style contraption?
In the original Candy Land, what is the final destination on the board?
What Parker Brothers game involves buying and selling stocks?
Which game requires players to carefully remove a patient's ailments without setting off a buzzer?
In Risk, what is the objective of the game?
options: Conquer the world by occupying all territories

questions.question: Which classic game uses a spring-loaded die popper in a plastic dome?
